vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Ἀγρίππας, -α (Bl., §7, 2), ὁ
Agrippa (II): Act.25:13, 22, 23, 24, 26 26:1, 2, 19, 27, 28, 32. (For Agrippa I, see: Ἡρῴδης, 3.) †
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
Tetrarch Herod Agrippa II living at the time of the New Testament, first mentioned at Act.25.13; son of: Tetrarch & King Herod Agrippa I (G2264I)
§ Agrippa, "wild horse"
Agrippa, (Proper name)
vocabInfos._es_Definition: Agripa  (1) Herodes Agripa I (HCH.12:1ff); (2) Herodes Agripa II (HCH.25:26)
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
亞基帕 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "英雄一樣的"
1) 耶穌時代, 統治以色列人的一個家族名
1a)亞基帕一世(徒 12:1|和合本作"希律")
1b)亞基帕二世
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
亚基帕这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是"英雄一样的"
1) 耶稣时代, 统治以色列人的一个家族名
1a)亚基帕一世(徒12:1|和合本作"希律")
1b)亚基帕二世
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: Ạc-ríp-ba hoặc Vua Ạc-ríp-pa « con ngựa hoang dã »: Vua Ạc-ríp-ba con của Hê-rốt Ạc-ríp-ba đệ I
